text:
[Verse]
Streetlights glowing bright
Neon colors in the night
City buzzin' feel the beat
Dancin' on these busy streets

[Verse 2]
Skyline painted in a glow
Feel the rush don't take it slow
Heartbeats race in time with sound
Lost and found in this playground

[Chorus]
City lights they shine for you
Everything feels so brand new
Under stars and endless skies
Lost beneath these city lights

[Verse 3]
Echoes bouncing off the walls
Feel the rhythm of it all
Voices call from far and near
Can you feel the city's cheer

[Chorus]
City lights they shine for you
Everything feels so brand new
Under stars and endless skies
Lost beneath these city lights

[Bridge]
Step by step we come alive
In this place where dreams reside
Every corner tells a tale
City's magic never fails
title: City Lights
